categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Lord Kyrus was a male Human Sith Lord who served the resurgent Sith Empire during the Cold War and the Galactic War. He was tasked with the mission of destroying the Rift Alliance's leaders before they returned to the Galactic Republic. He allied with the Child of the Emperor Augin Blaesus and together they captured the royal family of Sarkhai, but their plot come to an end when the Barsen'thor arrived and killed Kyrus and Blaesus.
Lord Kyrus was a master of the lightsaber and was capable of the Jar'Kai form in combat as demonstrated in his fight with the Barsen'thor of the Jedi Order.
